definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that includes a full display of armorial bearings that consists of the escutcheon plus its adjuncts.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that includes a full display of armorial bearings that consists of the escutcheon plus its adjuncts.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of an exact copy of an original, usually in the same dimensions as the original, especially of books, documents, prints, and drawings.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of an exact copy of an original, usually in the same dimensions as the original, especially of books, documents, prints, and drawings.
scope note[0]_en: Today the original is often reproduced photographically or digitally; in the past, it was reproduced by engraving or other printmaking process.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of labeled areas for recording structured data to be input by specified persons for specific purposes, usually accompanied by prompts and guidance.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of labeled areas for recording structured data to be input by specified persons for specific purposes, usually accompanied by prompts and guidance.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a table or diagram representing the lineage of a person or family.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a table or diagram representing the lineage of a person or family.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a diagram showing relative quantitative and qualitative aspects of a data set.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a diagram showing relative quantitative and qualitative aspects of a data set.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of adornments, usually in one or more colours and applied by hand to an item using paint, ink, or metal foil.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of adornments, usually in one or more colours and applied by hand to an item using paint, ink, or metal foil.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a still image.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a still image.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a representation, normally to scale and on a two-dimensional medium, of a selection of material or abstract features on, or in relation to, the surface of the earth, another celestial body, or an imaginary place.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a representation, normally to scale and on a two-dimensional medium, of a selection of material or abstract features on, or in relation to, the surface of the earth, another celestial body, or an imaginary place.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of an image created by light falling on a light-sensitive surface, usually photographic film or an electronic medium.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of an image created by light falling on a light-sensitive surface, usually photographic film or an electronic medium.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a detailed drawing or diagram.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a detailed drawing or diagram.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of a representation of an individual or group of persons or animals that is intended to capture a known or supposed likeness, especially the face of the individual.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of a representation of an individual or group of persons or animals that is intended to capture a known or supposed likeness, especially the face of the individual.

definition[0]_en: An illustrative content that consists of an individual unit, segment, or small quantity taken as evidence of the quality or character of the entire group or lot.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An illustrative content that consists of an individual unit, segment, or small quantity taken as evidence of the quality or character of the entire group or lot.
